rows.label: tlk70000062_03_msg0001
rows.name:
D'you know much about this Superbian
flagship? The tech to create something
like that doesn't exist here in Gula...

rows.label: tlk70000062_03_msg0002
rows.name:
What's more, Iira has even more
advanced technology...

rows.label: tlk70000062_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Iira's inherited all sorts of ancient
technologies. It's the technological
capital of Alst! Did you know that?

rows.label: tlk70000062_03_msg0004
rows.name:
It's my dream to go to Iira one day
and study its technology firsthand.
